memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *configPath, int numModules, int fake)
memberdef.name: ADLambda

parameterdescription.para: The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
The number of individual camera modules the system contains

briefdescription.para: Background thread to wait until an acquire signal is recieved.

detaileddescription.para: Afterwards, start the acquisition and create an acquire thread for each receiver. Then, wait until the threads all finish.

briefdescription.para: Thread spawned per detector module, acquires frames from indexed receiver and copies the data to the correct spot in the stitched image.

inbodydescription.para: Grab parameters that will be used for the entirety of the acquisition

briefdescription.para: Thread to pull and export NDArrays being generated by the acquisition threads.
Override super class's report method to provide detector specific info.

detaileddescription.para: When done, call ADDriver (direct super class) method to provide info from the upper classes.

briefdescription.para: Override from super class to handle detector specific parameters.

detaileddescription.para: If the parameter is from one of the super classes and is not handled here, then pass along to ADDriver (direct super class)

inbodydescription.para: Make sure that we write the value to the param

briefdescription.para: Class to wrap Lambda detector library provided by X-Spectrum.
